reviews.title: Bar Soap
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Cute packaging except for the open window, not a fan of everyone being able to directly smell and touch the soap. The bar soap didn't exactly provide 24h moisture & radiance but there was some hydration. It was bigger than expected and lathered more than expected. The scent was subtle which was fine but I wouldn't be upset with a more robust scent.
Like the light fragrance and how it moisturizes my skin but the large size of the bar makes it difficult to hold.

reviews.title: Fragrance
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I was very shocked with the size of the bar. It is really big. I might ne using it for a while. It has a more subtle fragrance than the body wash. It is actually very smooth when it lathers.

reviews.title: ok but nothing special
reviews.review_text: Im not generally a huge fan of bar soap. This one is ok. I didnt really notice any difference in my skin from using it. The scent is very strong. I smell it as soon as I walk into my bathroom, so if youre sensitive to smells this might not be for you. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: Soap is very soft
reviews.review_text: I needore time to see how it works
